argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | znbas.s | |- S = ( RSpan ` ZZring ) |
| 2 |  | znbas.y | |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) |
| 3 |  | znbas.r | |- R = ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( ZZring /s R ) = ( ZZring /s R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_zringbas | |- ZZ = ( Base ` ZZring ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ZZ = ( Base ` ZZring ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) e. _V |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_eqeltri | |- R e. _V |
| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( N e. NN0 -> R e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_zringring | |- ZZring e. Ring |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ZZring e. Ring ) |
| 12 | 4, 6, 9, 11 | #P_qusbas | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( ZZ /. R ) = ( Base ` ( ZZring /s R ) ) ) |
| 13 | 3 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( ZZring /s R ) = ( ZZring /s ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 13, 2 | #P_znbas2 | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( Base ` ( ZZring /s R ) ) = ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( ZZ /. R ) = ( Base ` Y ) ) |
